title: MVC Paradigm
content: The model view controller (MVC) paradigm is a great way to keep code organized and understandable. This becomes more and more important as a project gets bigger.

title: Object Relational Mapping
content: Object relational mapping, or ORM, allows you to interact with, update, and read from a database while maintaining an object oriented programming approach. This helps keep code consistent and can make life much easier.
